author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: If they are motor-sailing they had better have their black cone point down displayed when in the waters of our friends the Belgians otherwise they are likely to be fined.

author: Willy
content:
Just imagine the results with a bigger sail. It could collapse into the mast with a hinged boom.

Now with these powered units getting a hybrid sail. Will they be able to command right of way as per sail boats? (rhetorical)
